ThingDef.label: barren troll
ThingDef.description:
A species of troll that has adapted to life in arid regions, though they have also been sighted in the ashlands. Due to their arid preferences, the barren troll has adopted an opportunistic diet, and is more likely to be seen scavenging than hunting.

Trolls are thought to have diverged from apes sometime in the past. Likely a very long time ago, as the only remaining ape-like characteristics are their appearance. Like most other trolls, the barren troll is not particularly intelligent, though more than makes up for this in brute strength.

Like all other trollkin, the blood of barren trolls possesses strong regenerative abilities, allowing the troll to heal bleeding wounds relatively quickly. This blood may be harvested during butchering, and used to create elixirs of regeneration. If dealing with a particularly aggressive troll, it is best to set it on fire, as this will inhibit their regeneration.
